DataElement.preferredDefinition: the height value, vertical measurement or distance, of a transplant recipient  prior to the administration of high doses of chemotherapy or radiation therapy, as well as immunosuppressive therapy, prior to a bone marrow or hematopoietic stem cell transplant (conditioning destroys the patient's abnormal blood cells or cancer, as well as slows the patient's immune response against the donor bone marrow (graft rejection)).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to height, vertical measurement or distance, of a transplant recipient  prior to the administration of high doses of chemotherapy or radiation therapy, as well as immunosuppressive therapy, prior to a bone marrow or hematopoietic stem cell transplant (conditioning destroys the patient's abnormal blood cells or cancer, as well as slows the patient's immune response against the donor bone marrow (graft rejection)).

Property.preferredDefinition:
Administration of high doses of chemotherapy or radiation therapy, as well as immunosuppressive therapy,
to a transplant.:Height; the vertical dimension of extension; distance from the base of something to the top.

Concepts.definition: Administration of high doses of chemotherapy or radiation therapy, as well as immunosuppressive therapy, to a transplant recipient prior to a bone marrow or hematopoietic stem cell transplant.  Conditioning destroys the patient's abnormal blood cells or cancer, as well as slows the patient's immune response against the donor bone marrow (graft rejection).
The vertical measurement or distance from the base to the top of an object; the vertical dimension of extension.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical result of the determination of the vertical distance of an individual.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Height; the vertical dimension of extension; distance from the base of something to the top.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The vertical measurement or distance from the base to the top of an object; the vertical dimension of extension.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Height at initiation of pre-t
ReferenceDocuments.description: Height at initiation of pre-transplant conditioning/preparative
